Heading: Love the upgrade
Text: No issue no bugs. Really easy transitioning to new commands and controls great phone and easy signup

Heading: I love this phone!
Text: Before I bought this phone I had the iPhone 6s, traded it in for the iPhone 8. Realized very quickly that was a mistake and returned it to purchase this! I absolutely love it!! It’s amazing!

Heading: Galaxy converter
Text: I upgraded my Galaxy S8 and this was great. Music plays better and the user interface is even better than on iPads. It is a lot more user friendly than my galaxy and I have only had Samsung the last 10years

Heading: Best Phone ever
Text: Apple makes a great smartphone and this is their best phone ever.

Heading: Nice
Text: Its a nice color and has been a good product, have had a good experience.

Heading: Awesome Phone!
Text: I'm loving my new iPhone X! The facial recognition is fabulous!!! My only other desires would be for an additional fingerprint access option. I'd also like it to be just a little smaller, but it is still an ok size. The help at Best Buy was incredible! They took all the time I needed to explain everything there was to know about the phone! Thanks Best Buy!!!

Heading: GREAT PHONE - GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE
Text: I LOVE MY NEW X PHONE - IT'S GREAT. AND THE YOUNG MAN WHO HELPED ME WAS ALSO GREAT. I CAN'T REMEMBER HIS NAME, BUT HE WAS VERY PATIENT AND PERSONABLE.

Heading: Awesome
Text: Awesome phone but lame sprint service.me and my boyfriend been team iPhone for too long and probably will until we die lol so as long as apple keep pushing them out we’ll take it’s kinda the futuristic phone

Heading: Love my iPhone X
Text: Love my iPhone X. So glad I purchased. I upgraded from an iPhone 6

Heading: Great phone!
Text: Upgraded from iPhone 5... what a difference! The photos I can take now are really nice.

Heading: Love the new features!
Text: Face recognition works great- with or without glasses or a hat, even in the dark (by just the light of the screen) the technology recognizes me 99% of the time. Bigger screen is A++++. I couldn't give it 5 stars, however, until I figure out how to do the portrait manipulations with the camera that they showed off in the advertisements... not intuitive at all, so I guess I will have to google or wait for the IPhone guy on Facebook to post helpful hints in order to take advantage of the best aspects of the new camera. Still, picture quality is better than I was getting with the 6S. It only takes a few days to get used to the button-free features... but I was not happy to realize that I can't connect the phone to my car without some kind of bluetooth adaptor. I'll be heading back to best buy for that. Too expensive to just get a new car.

Heading: A very nice surprise!
Text: My new iPhone X is great, and easier to use than my iPhone5! The swipe up was easy to adjust to, and the larger keyboard is such a help! Excellent camera, too! This 77 year old, tech-adverse grandma is very pleased!!!

Heading: Took a chance and don't regret it!
Text: I was thinking of upgrading my 7 plus with iPhone 8 plus but decided to go for the X. I wasn't disappointed. Takes a while to get used to no home button, but now I don't miss it. I have been using wireless headphones for a while so who cares about the jack! Also, screen size is just as big as my 7 plus, but overall device is smaller. No regrets!

Heading: beutuful
Text:
Apple - iPhone X 64GB - Space Gray (Sprint)
iPhone X features an all-screen design with a 5.8-inch Super Retina HD display with HDR and True Tone.¹ Designed with the most durable glass ever in a smartphone and a surgical grade stainless steel...

Heading: VISUALLY STUNNING!
Text: I bought this Apple X just on a whim and decided to start new service and cell phone with a start of my new life. I couldn't have been more pleased, the clarity of the picture is sharp, the use is easy to follow and I couldn't be more happier!

Heading: Great phone
Text: I love this thing. I was hesitant to lose my home button, but I’ve now forgot what it was like to have one... faceID is slick and pretty accurate. Only thing that I’ve noticed is that some apps are designed to handle the screen with the notch area at the top.

Heading: Best Apple Phone yet
Text: Many new festivals and great pictures. Best Apple Phone yet.

Heading: My wife loves it!
Text:
My wife probably could have gotten away with an iPhone 8, but we had the opportunity to pick up a couple of X's at our local BB, so we did. I can say I've been very pleased with my X, and my wife has loved hers as well.

The battery live is a big improvement over our ageing iPhone 6s phones. I can actually get through the day without having to charge my phone at lunch, or run an external battery pack. We'll see how the batteries hold up over time though.

Heading: Quality phone
Text: I love the gestures. I watched YouTube for some reminders. The guy at the store initially demonstrated them. My phone has many great, free apps. However, when I’m powering it, my Bluetooth won’t work: so, I bought an adaptor so I can charge it while wired EarPods are plugged in.

Heading: The upgrade I been waiting for!
Text: I must admit, I am that guy that gets each new iPhone. They string me in every time! So being someone that has been through every version, I can honestly say this is my favorite iteration of the phone, ever. This is by far, the best iPhone! It’s fast, the screen is beautiful, and the facial recognition works amazingly. Many complain about that small bump that takes up real estate from the screen. It did bother me at first. After 2 weeks, I don’t seem to notice it anymore. My only complaint is the fingerprint reader unlocked everything faster. I didn’t even need to lift the phone. The facial recognition does work great, but you have to have your face right in front of it. I cant really consider that a flaw, seeing as that is what the phone intends to do. Overall, the phone is worth the money!

Heading: WOW!!!
Text:
Wow!!Great phone and I’m still learning new features!!
Wow!! Expensive!! Not sur yet if it’s worth the extra cash but I am enjoying it if I can just remember that there is no home button!

Heading: The best iPhone
Text: New iPhone X is great. I really like the new screen and this phone is very durable. A lot of new features that set it apart from the other smartphones on the market. The face ID is one of the great new features.

Heading: iPhone for life
Text: In my expereince with Apple products since the iPhone 4, I've always loved how my iPhones perform. I've tried Android devices and yet still have a tried and true preference for Apple. My iPhone X is no exception - love it!

Heading: A revolutionary new type of phone
Text: This phone is a revelation. With such a large screen in a small body it gives you plenty of space for content and apps, in a pocketable and hand-holdable size. Great cameras, especially in low-light. Benefit of the ultra-wide screen with video is any cinematic video can now fill the screen.

Heading: Three bears
Text: This is my second iPhone X. It replaced my note 8 so now I have 2. I love the look and feel. The screen is awesome and I like the form factor. I came from a 7 plus and thought it was a little too big but this is just right. You take the 8, 8 plus and X and you have the perfect three bears scenario. One too big. One too small and one just right

Heading: There is No Substitute-BEST!
Text: Get this with the Apple silicone case and Zagg screen protector. Silky smooth and BEAUTIFUL. I love everything about it. Can't put it down. Had them all before. Size, OLED screen, face ID all works harmoniously. I'm in disbelief a product can actually be this good. Breathless on it really. Sheer genius by Apple. Do yourself a favor and get this. Nothing even comes close. Thank you Apple and Best Buy. So happy...

Heading: Feels like an android phone
Text: When I decide to go with iPhone X I thought this phone would be better than my iphone 6 plus. The only reason I decide to buy iphone x is because my iphone 6 plus is acting up due to Apple's new IOS update. All the apps on my phone can barely load without the 5-10 seconds waiting time. Everyone of my friends I show how my iphone 6 plus act they were like this is worst than my 5 years old android phone. After using it for more than a month, nothing in this phone really makes me feel like it's a great phone. Major downsize what the screen, this is no 5.8" screen to me. I hate watching Youtube with the screen blow up and having part of the screen get cut off. Watching it full size the screen are smaller than my iphone 6 plus. The only reason I am still using an iphone is that they have better security over any other smart phones in the market.

Heading: Great Phone
Text:
I've always liked apple iphones but, I'm glad i got this at a great price, Thanks Best Buy for the deals. 
Iphone X has lots of new features, no more bottons finger prints. It uses face recognition, for all my apps that requires password including payment. The screen is from top to bottom except where the front camera is.

Heading: Awesome phone
Text: Awesome phone, works really well and long lasting battery

Heading: Love this phone
Text: By far my fav iPhone. Took awhile to get used to the no home button, but Face ID works 97% of the time. And the battery life is amazing. Love this phone

Heading: Excellent Option for Pennies More
Text: Apple consistently has great products, but the upgrades available on the iPhone X were well worth the additional pennies.

Heading: Great phone all around
Text: I love this iPhone X. Wasn't sure if I would like the face recognition, but I do. The one thing I do miss is that it doesn't show the remaining battery life by a percentage until you plug it in to charge it. The camera is excellent.

Heading: Love it
Text: I love iPhones and so far this has been my favorite one!

Heading: Great phone
Text: Great phone. My son loves it! He really likes the bigger screen. Also likes being able to open the phone with face recognition. The pictures taken with the camera are also very impressive. The storage is much larger than his last phone which allows him to have more room for all the apps.

Heading: Great phone for starters
Text: Love this phone good quality good apps fast and aloooot of g hites recommend

Heading: Nice phone
Text: When deciding on my next phone upgrade I was deciding between the Samsung S9 and the iPhone X. The iPhone one because I am a returning iPhone customer, the form factor of the phone.

Heading: Love the form factor
Text: Awesome, awesome phone. I love the screen and speed of the device. Face recognition works extremely well. I love how much smaller it is in your hand and pocket than the plus versions of previous models. My only annoyance is that I purchased it online without seeing it. The screen is stated to be bigger than the plus versions of the 6,7, and 8 but the phone is overall smaller because of the narrow bezels. While it technically is true, in the sense of diagonal inches, it is very narrow and tall, so the extra space is unusable. I came from a 7plus and while the screen was technically smaller diagonally, while using it, it felt larger. Because of the narrowness of the X screen, the keyboard is actually smaller than I was used to. All things considered though, great phone.

Heading: Awesome Phone, awesome screen!
Text: I bought this phone practically when it first came out. I was hesitant to switch from the regular style iPhone to this new style. After much time with it and using all of my regular apps on it, I can say that I now prefer the no home button full-screen display over the old one. I love just now big the screen looks and with the button gone, I feel like its so much more modern. Thank you apple, best buy!

Heading: iPhone X does not disappoint
Text: This is an upgrade from iPhone 5s. I finally had to give it up. I like the phone and all of it's functionality. The only thing it might take me awhile to get used to is not having the home button for fingerprint recognition. The face recognition is iffy at times. When I'm in a low light situation, it doesn't recognize me. I miss my fingerprint access. Other than that, it's a great phone and I don't expect anything less from Apple.

Heading: Great price for an iPhone!
Text: The service and information we received was perfect. The trade in of our son's old phone was handled smoothly.

Heading: Great phone
Text: I enjoy using this phone and the recent software builds improved used slightly after the new ios update came out. it's getting back to normal and I am not tempted to get the latest and greatest this year so far. maybe next year, but still works great.

Heading: Terrific phone
Text: iPhone X is a terrific piece of technology. I love it. Easy to use and compatible with other technologies.

Heading: Great phone.
Text: This is a great phone. I especially like the portrait mode when using the camera.

Heading: Awesome technology
Text: Gorgeous screen. Super fast processor. Great sound quality in phone calls. Awesome facial recognition for logins faster and easier than even a fingerprint. A no regret upgrade. I upgraded from 7 Plus to this X. You will love this phone. Really enjoy the smaller profile of the X without losing screen size from the 7 Plus.

Heading: Fantastic
Text: This phone has been an incredible upgrade from the Galaxy S6. I love the music features the most, and Apple Music has been AMAZING for my workouts.

Heading: Easy to navigate!
Text: Love my iphone and galaxy. They are very easy to use and love the camara!

Text: This was a purchase for our daughter to replace her old phone. I think she is happy and quickly adjusting to the loss of the home button feature

Text: Works great, no problems at all. Easy and convenient

Heading: Loving my new iPhone X
Text: So far I've been loving the new iPhone X. I upgraded from an iPhone 6 and the differences are night and day. My favorite feature by far is the FaceID. Works quickly and has yet to not work, even when it's dark out! I'm not missing a dedicated home button AT ALL. Text: Love it! I had the easiest transition to this phone, seamless!

Heading: I'd give it 10 stars!
Text: I have had cell phones since 1988 and I never thought I'd like one as much as my strata, but this one is the best yet!

Heading: BEST iPHONE YET!!
Text: So I was able to go through the phone and features within a couple days, and I'm not sure if it's just that I'm an Apple person, but everything about this upgrade is awesome! From how fast the processor to the video quality and apps. Only thing is, it's not as big as the Samsung Galaxy Note 8. It's like Apple is always one behind on the size of the phone. I can't wait for the X Plus to arrive!

Heading: Excellent upgrade
Text:
I moved from Samsung Galaxy S7 Edge to 256G iPhone X. Throughout my life, I have been Nokia (old one & Window OS one) and Samsung (Android phone) user. 
I like the feel and features given by this iPhone X. Face detection is awesome (works in dark as well). Entire phone is your screen and hence, some of the functionality got change. But it only take one day to get used to it. 
Overall - excellent upgrade for me.

Heading: iPhone
Text: I purchased this for my wife. Went into the store to purchase the Note9 and she became a trader. She opted for the iPhone instead. It is an ok phone but my wife uses her Galaxy S6 for most everything. Basically only uses the iPhone for the phone.

Heading: so far so good
Text: This was an upgrade for my teenage son. So far he is really enjoying the phone, even considering he switched from android. It is a good size and takes great pictures. My only concern right now is that they will be discontinuing this model later this year but I guess that is how it goes with mobile phones.

Heading: i-Phone 10X 256 gb
Text: The 10X is even better tha I hoped. I bought the phone and transferred my music, pictures, etc so easily myself at home. I love the face recognition as my security protocol. 5 stars to Best Buy and Apple.

Heading: Great phone
Text: Have had no problems with this phone, and has been durable as it’s been dropped a few times on the screen!

Heading: Another Apple Homerun
Text: If you're a iPhone person and are the fence about spending so much $$$ on a phone than this may not be for you. It's a great phone but nothing less than we would expect from Apple. Honestly the only reason I bought it was so my oldest daughter and I could communicate via animoji.

Heading: Nice phone
Text: Upgraded from an iPhone se the iPhone X is great. Upgraded features makes it a good fit in today’s tech world.

Heading: A great phone
Text: I switched over from a galaxy note 8 for one reason I didn’t want my data sold. Apple as far as I know it’s pretty strict about selling your data to advertisers. They make money selling you expensive stuff . I liked the galaxy eight a little better but this one is pretty close , it just take some interesting getting used to swipe gestures and everything. almost perfect couple things they could improve such as key combinations and things like that but it works really wel. the screen is beautiful and the integration with other Apple products works well.

Heading: Love it!
Text:
I DID NOT WANT A BIGGER SCREEN.. This phone is nearly the exact same size as my Samsung S5 which it is replacing. I wanted a phone that would readily fit in my pocket if needed.
It is my first iPhone so it's taking some getting use to but I'm liking it so far

Heading: Great phone
Text:
I love the new features. The custom emojis are really cool. I do miss my home button though, sometimes with low lighting my phone can’t pick up 
my face.

Heading: My daughter loves her new phone!
Text: She really enjoys this phone and is very happy with the camera quality.

Heading: Love it!
Text: Glad I got the 256 GB, totally worth it! Never have to worry about how much is on my phone!

Heading: Amazing phone
Text: I love my new iPhone X. It has an amazing camera and the battery life is so long. I would recommend it to a friend. Also, it was super easy to register it with my carrier through Best Buy.

Heading: So far so good
Text: I bought this phone for my 13-year-old daughter. She loves it so far but says it seems to charge slow. To be honest, I don't know if it really charges slow or if it is because she is on it all the time. She listens to music via blue tooth, face times with her friends etc. and all works wonderfully. So not sure if the battery charges slowly or not. That's her only complaint. When school starts and she her time is more limited I am guessing that complaint of hers may disappear. hehe At least I hope it does.

Heading: Love
Text: I love the item I recommend the phone to anyone who would wont a phone

Heading: iPhone how I have missed you
Text: Switched back to an iPhone. Great choice...how I’ve missed you apple product. Super great service from the Best Buy employee. I went with the iPhone X, it fits in my hand really well and it was actually very easy to transfer information from my old android to the new phone.

Heading: The best in market!
Text: I would say the best phone in market, but lots of money. I love the camera portrait mode, it is awesome, its equivalent to SLR Cams. The phone is easy to use and its sooper fast compared to the better configs in Android. If you have the money go for it, without any second thoughts, so far the best iPhone made ever.

Heading: Loving My New IPhone X!
Text: I was initially concerned about the lack of home button and having to use facial recognition and new gestures, but it appears that the advances in technology, are just that, advances! I like being able to look at and unlock my phone, even in the dark. I like the full screen with nearly no bezel. Overall, it feels like an upgrade to the iPhone in general.

Heading: Nice!
Text: I actually started out with the iPhone 8 Plus. That was so big (I had a 7 before) and very heavy. I decided to spend the extra money to get the iPhone X. I am so happy that I did!!! It is fast, the screen quality is excellent and I love the camera. It is a little heavier than the 7 but much better size and weight than the plus size. Worth the price in my opinion.

Heading: great phone
Text: Got this at a great price with a lot of storage space, easy to navigate take great picture and has great apps

Heading: Perfect Phone
Text: I was a little hesitant to switch, but this phone is everything you could ever want. Huge screen, lots of storage and the lack of a home button did not bother me at all. Highly recommended!

Heading: iPhone X
Text: Gotta be cool with an X in the name. And it is. It’s so cool it will make the cool kids let you sit at their table. No more swirlies in the bathroom by the bullies. You won’t know what to do with all of your new friends.

Heading: A phone for tech savvy and non tech savvy people
Text: This phone is great for everyone. If you prefer to just use the phone to call and text, you can do so. If you want to be more advanced on this phone, you can also do so. I love all the features of this phone. It is great but is expensive compared to other models. Be careful of your camera lens and screen. I highly recommend purchase Apple Care.

Heading: WOW!!!!!!
Text: I recently upgraded from my iphone 6s that i had for 2 years and WOW!!! The iphone x is a very amazing phone. The first day I was on the fence about since there was no more home button but after getting used to the commands I am shock at how such an amazing phone it is. I love the camera, the speed, the look and the feel.

Heading: Amazing item!
Text: Great, super useful and user friendly. A little expensive for the upgrade, but worth it.

Heading: Love
Text: This was my first upgrade in a few years and wow. This is an amazing phone. Only issue is the face ID in the mornings. It normally doesn't recognize my face and, to be fair, I'm not a morning person and probably look extra grumpy.

Heading: It’s a great iPhone, just love it.
Text: I’m glad I went Best Buy to purchase an iPhone to give as a gift to my daughter because I actually own same iPhone and it’s very good quality and Best Buy has to have better prices. I totally recommend to others .

Heading: IPHONE X
Text: Transitioning from my Samsung Note 3 was easier then I thought. There was a five minute learning curve to get the basics down. A lot of things are already done for you.

Heading: The future in your hands
Text: If you don’t think the extra $200 vs the 8 is worth it, think again. Having a screen larger then the plus that fits in your hand feels amazing and really does feel like the future. You don’t really notice the notch - and the best part is the bar at the bottom that lets you quickly switch between apps. Trust me this is the phone you need to buy - not an 8.

Heading: Great product
Text: Works great and is a great upgrade. Went from a 6s to this and not disappointed!

Heading: Great iPhone for deaf people. I’m deaf I should kn
Text: Love it. No problems. Does EVERYTHING I want it to do.

Heading: Truly state of the art!
Text: This by far so far is the best phone in the market! Bigger screen efficiency is awsome, looks good!

Heading: Best phone so far from Apple
Text: It is a weird adjustment not having a home button but once you get used to it, this phone is super easy to use, fast to navigate. Ended up selling my camera because the camera on my phone was 10x better

Heading: Best iPhone
Text: Best iPhone on the market. X has all the features most people need.

Heading: LOVE
Text: Everything about this phone is incredible! The camera is phenomenal! It makes them look professionally done. The speakers make your music sound like you are actually front row at a concert and the face unlocking is out of this world and so simple!

Heading: Nice Phone
Text: This phone is expensive but never had issues with it! User friendly! Apple is a great product

Heading: good phone so far
Text: I have never wanted an iphone but my entire family convinces me and the transition from a Samsung has been a little challenging but I like the phone now and my wife loves that I now have an iphone too

Heading: Great iPhone, Amazing Phone
Text: This phone is absolutely fantastic. Coming from an iPhone 7, this phone is blazing fast and incredibly beautiful with its high resolution 5.8” OLED display. I have no complaints at all with this phone and quite frankly I can’t believe this is an iPhone. Definitely recommend to anyone and everyone.

Heading: Amazing phone!
Text: Been an iPhone fan for years. Upgraded to this from the iPhone 5. While I was hesitant about the new face unlock feature, I don’t think I’ll be able to go back to a phone that doesn’t have it. I also don’t miss the home button like I thought I would. Great phone!!!

Heading: Amazing phone!
Text: Been an iPhone fan for years. Upgraded to this from the iPhone 5. While I was hesitant about the new face unlock feature, I don’t think I’ll be able to go back to a phone that doesn’t have it. I also don’t miss the home button like I thought I would. Great phone!!!

Heading: Love it!
Text: Bought it for my daughter, she has been so satisfied she wants me to get same one for myself

Heading: Perfect size to hold with one hand
Text: Perfect size to hold with one hand welcome change  from iPhone 7  plus.

Heading: Big and easy to use
Text: Great phone, easy to use and easy to read. I would purchase this item again.

Heading: Great
Text: our son decided to switch to apple.  So far he really likes it

Heading: Intuitive
Text: Of all the upgrades to the iPhone X, none are more impressive than the camera features. I purchased this a little early specifically for a family vacation and the pictures/video were nothing short of professional. As my grandson said, I could have spent twice as much on a professional camera and gotten poorer quality pictures.

Heading: Great phone!
Text: Great phone.  Big improvement over iPhone 7. Love the speed and the camera!

Heading: Unexpectedly Great!
Text: My last phone was an iPhone 7 Plus. It costs. me about $960.00 so the price on this was not necessarily an issue. I was disappointed in the iPhone X design when it was unveiled and the price was pretty daunting. However, I was pleasantly surprised. After a very short time I no longer noticed the notch and, as much of a sceptic as I was, the Face ID is really cool.

Heading: Excellent Deal
Text: My first iPhone and I picked a good one. Huge GB storage at a great price. Just the right size

Heading: Apple wins again!
Text: I’m a true Apple lover and the XS Max didn’t disappoint. I love the larger screen size and the portrait mode makes pictures turn out amazing!

Heading: I absolutely love this phone
Text: This phone is just fabulous. I don't miss the home button at all. The facial recognition doesn't work as perfectly as I had hoped, but I am still giving it 5 stars. You just have to be sure the phone is held up and aimed right at your face. I feel it is highly over priced really, but then again, it is a great product. I wouldn't consider any other phone but an iPhone.

Heading: FANTASTIC!
Text: I was hesitant about spending the money for the X, but figured I use my phone more than any other device in life, so might as well splurge. This thing is fantastic. The facial recognition log in is excellent - I don't even think about the phone pulling up at all any more. It just opens. Battery life is excellent as well as speed. Good job Apple and good deal Best Buy.

Heading: Very Nice iPhone
Text: Loving the iPhone X, jailbroken on iOS 12.1.1 beta, this phone is nice and fast!!!!

Heading: It’s an iPhone
Text: I cannot remember if I had issues with previous models, but I am noticing the battery drains much quicker than it used to.

Heading: Love it!
Text: Way better than my 6s plus. Face recognition works well and can always put the code in if it’s too dark or something is obstructing my face.

Heading: Such an amazing phone in all categories
Text: The phone has such good sound but it could be improved so it's as loud as the galaxy phones--- the quality and resolution pixels cannot beat anything else

Heading: Great
Text: Nice phone.my son loves it.will buy again for my other kids.

Heading: Good deal
Text: Shopped for a new phone at the right time with the Sprint promotion in Best Buy 50%OFF for this IPhone X 256GB...wow...I love this phone.

Heading: New Apple X smart phone...
Text: The previous 2 smart phones we had were Samsung (latest Galaxy S6). I got tired of reinstalling apps on my wife's phone after an Android upgrade. Also, my wife got proficient with reconnecting to the home WiFi after an Android upgrade. So far we have had one Apple OS upgrade and no issues except my wife had problems telling the OS that she did NOT want to use Apple Pay...

Heading: iPhone X
Text: I finally decided to upgrade from my 7plus and I love the decision. The X is pricey but the design and functionality are great. Kudos to Apple once again.

Heading: Great phone for wifey
Text: Hmmm made wife so happy to see a new iPhone X ready to use and abuse. :-)

Heading: Worth the upgrade
Text: Love the larger screen area and the Retina display. Facial recognition takes some getting used to and doesn’t always work but it’s a great phone.

Heading: Nice phone
Text: I'm not an Apple fan but I have to give credit where it is due. Bought this phone for my daughter - graduation gift. Built really well and has a smooth and efficient OS. Only negative is pricing. It could be a little less expensive. Certainly a great gift for a deserving child ; )

Heading: First IPhone in 10 years
Text: I have been an avid Android user, I hated the first 2 iPhones I had, I switched to Android and never looked back. I took a risk when I decided to take a chance on this phone, I have NOT been disappointed!

Heading: Great phone
Text: The iPhone X is a great upgrade to the iPhone. The increased use of space for the screen makes the screen looks beautiful. The facial recognition works flawlessly, and the phone is the perfect size. Would definitely recommend this to anyone looking to upgrade from a lower model phone, especially because the 8 is not much different from the 7.

Heading: New iPhine
Text: I need to upgrade my phone and this new I phone has all the function I need .

Heading: iPhone X
Text: I have loved every iPhone I have owned since my first 4s ! That being said they are getting too pricey & although I love the added security of apple products I’m not sure they are worth it anymore in relation to new features offered. Last two I owned I felt the value for price paid just isn’t there when you compare to comparable android models. First time I’m giving an iffy review of an apple product ever.

Heading: Close to perfect
Text: The iPhone X is a beautiful phone. The new oled display is beautiful, going edge to edge and with a notch at the top. Some may not like the notch, but you get used to it. Apple FINALLY releases wireless charging into an iPhone, so this is nice. The phone has a premium feel with the stainless steel frame, and glass back. Face ID is a nice concept, but I’d rather have a finger print reader on the back. If you place your phone down on a table you’ll find yourself leaning over to get into view for the Face ID to work. Besides that the only complaint I have is the price of the phone.

Heading: Nice size
Text: Love my new iPhone. It does everything i need in s phone.

Heading: Good phone and not hetty
Text: Bought this phone for my friend who has recently come to USA. I personally use Samsung Galaxy Note 8. The phone becomes slow at times. My wife use iPhone X and I was amazed to see the performance. Except camera, I believe rest of the phone is far better than Samsung Galaxy Note 8. Awesome product.

Heading: Love my X!
Text: It was a hard sell because I was afraid of losing the home button, but I’m so glad I did it! I love this iPhone so much! It was so easy to learn and now I’ll never go back!

Heading: Got as a birthday gift
Text: Love the Face ID so much faster than typing in passwords

Heading: Favorite iPhone in a long time
Text: First time in years and years that a new iPhone feels like a NEW phone. Love it. Very easy to adjust to the lack of a home button. No headphone jack which can be irritating

Heading: Amazing
Text: I upgraded from the iPhone 6s Plus. So far the battery is fantastic the speed is second to none. I I was skeptical about the facial unlock verses the fingerprint but I have to say I prefer the facial unlock over the fingerprint. No need to worry about taking your gloves off in the winter to unlock your iPhone! It’s amazing and I would highly recommend it.

Heading: Best iPhone Yet
Text: I replaced my iPhone 6s Plus with the X. It took a little bit to get used to the removal of the home button, but now I love it. The Face ID works great except when I am laying in bed at night. The camera is truly better than any camera I have ever owned. Apple fan for life.

Heading: Great phone if you only want the best
Text: I had an iPhone 5S until earlier this year. I decided to try the Samsung Galaxy 8. After 5 months, I decided to trade it in for the iPhone X. It is so much better. Much easier to use Apple CarPlay than android auto with both of my chevys. Alexa is also easier to use than Bixby.

Heading: My new iPhone X
Text: I am delighted with my new iPhone X. I looked at it in March but did not purchase it, however, last week I decided to look at it again and I bought it. It is easy to use and has a lot a nice features, some of which I haven't even toyed with yet. All in all, I am glad I bought it.

Heading: Smooth phone
Text: As an iPhone user for many years I can say this version is good as most of the upgrades are, the only thing is that most apps still don’t have support for the faceid and loops themselves sometimes & if your life is attached to having a home button you’re going to crazy the 1st weeks trying to get used to it, so overall is good..: expensive but good

Heading: iOS is the best
Text: I have had an iPhone ever since the very first model has come out. They are easy to use and can do so much and are capable of a multitude of things.

Heading: Simply the BEST!
Text: Upgraded from a 6 Plus and there is no comparison! I think skipping an upgrade cycle makes the technological improvements quite a bit more noticeable. Face recognition is working very well, I'm working on multiple self photos so I can fire up the phone while wearing sunglasses!

Heading: A perfect upgrade
Text:
This phone has all the cool features Apple is known for. The size is perfect, especially since the screen i larger than my outgoing 7+. The Face ID takes some getting used to after years of fingerprint security.

The processor is super fast too.

Heading: New phone (a while ago)
Text: When these first came out however many months ago, my husband would have no rest until we got them. So we did. They are nice. A little bit big, but otherwise nice. Sorry for the crazy late review.

Heading: Great phone
Text: Have always loved IPhones—this does not disappoint. Took a little getting used to no “home button”—but now seems intuitive. Great photos—still learning features. Seems very sturdy too.

Heading: Great phone
Text: Tons of storage. Perfect size and weight. Works the same as all Apple products.

Heading: Best iPhone you can get
Text: The X, imho, is the best iphone to date. I like it better than the XR or XS and would recommend to anyone looking to upgrade.

Heading: Great phone
Text: Best Buy was offering an upgrade special so we took advantage. Great phone. Vivid display. Nice new features.

Heading: Best phone
Text: My wife just love her phone works even better when you add a Apple Watch

Heading: Memojis are hilarious!
Text: At first I wasn't impressed. Unlocking with my face seemed like a gimmick (and kind of still is), but the Memojis are so fun. I needed an upgrade and got this on Sprint's upgrade deal.

Heading: Best Upgrade
Text: Coming from the 7, this is an upgrade in battery life, screen space, and hard disk space. One of the better iPhones yet IMO.

Heading: Iphone
Text: Great phone think battery last longer in this one than the car. Prefer this over XX. Have both

Heading: Best iPhone Ever
Text: I had bought the iPhone 8 Plus thinking their might be some major issues considering this was a big redesign not just for the hardware but the UI software as well. Man was I completely wrong and thank goodness my stepdaughter had an upgrade due. This phone is amazing and the new UI is great. Very fluid motions and beautiful screen. A must buy for a tech lover.

Heading: Great new iPhone and easy to operate
Text: iPhone is same except for no buttons now on the iPhone 10 X instead u swipe to do everything now. It took a minute but now I’m used to it and like it way better.

Heading: Huge upgrade from previous years IPhones.
Text: It’s an excellent phone, fast and sleek. I love the full screen, but it was a good week to get used to no button on the bottom.

Heading: Best camera yet
Text: My wife loves her new iPhone she bought it for the camera and it didn’t disappoint. Battery life is about two days with no charge

Heading: Best iPhone Yet!
Text: It was a little difficult to get used to the iPhone X for the first day or two, but I absolutely love the new technology and especially the new camera and its features! Apple has made a major improvement to it’s camera and capabilities. As all Apple products are it’s very user-friendly and capable of so much more than my one year-old iPhone 7!

Heading: iPhone X
Text: Apple products are great for the most part. A little pricey, but that’s nothing new. I love the sleek design of this phone, the sound is amazing and it takes fabulous photos. I think that it has as much memory as the first computer that I ever owned, maybe more! But it is so much faster! HaHa!

Heading: love my new phone
Text: I love my new phone just having a hard time with out the start button

Heading: The most advanced iPhone yet
Text: I ordered this on the first day and it arrived in only 1 week. I had an issue when paying for the phone at the store but I won't hold that against the iPhone. I really like the size and got used to the new changes very quickly. I would say go for the iPhone 8 or X depending on what the current price and your preference is. You will be happy with either one.

Heading: Great phone
Text: Good camera quality, overall very satisfied with purchase.

Heading: Great iPhone for the new upgrade
Text: I got the black iPhone X and I really love how simple this iPhone is versus the different iPhone X that there are now. Just like the iPhone 8 plus except the face recognition and fullscreen

Heading: It's an Iphone
Text: Aside from all the fancy new features and bezeless display, it is an iPhone with IOS11. You can probably get the same features in the iPhome 8 and save a few bucks. The X is a lot smaller than I thought it would be so keep that in mind if you are coming from a larger phone.

Heading: New phone
Text: Battery life is good. Phone works great. I washed my last one, bought on Best Buy and picked up later that day. Doesn’t get more easy than that.

Heading: great self portrait camera
Text: The portrait feature can now be used for selfies and there’s new filters to go with it. I love the stage lighting filter. It blacks out everything around you and makes you look like a giant sticker placed on a black background.

Heading: Beautiful
Text:
Got this for my sister in law for her upgrade with AT&T. I always upgrade with bestbuy. They are so much easier to deal with then the actual phone service retail associates. 

We got her the silver and it looks beautiful. I cant stop staring at it.

Heading: Great so far
Text: I have only had the phone for about two weeks now. But so far no problems at all. The battery with me using it a lot last’s around 8 hours. That’s with my Apple Watch paired to it also.

Heading: iPhone
Text: Love the phone. Hesitant to leave my iPhone 7. Very easy to use.

Heading: Best iPhone
Text: My wife and I both had iPhone 7 Pluses and enjoyed the big screen, but found it awkward to type. This has a much better looking screen that is almost as large in a smaller package.

Heading: Best iPhone yet!
Text: I purchased the iPhone X even though I heard reviews of it not being worth the money. I absolutely love this phone. I love that is is less bulky but you have a larger screen. Fits into wristlets where my iPone 6 Plus did not. The face recognition is one of my favorite features. I don’t miss the button! It was a slight learning curve but I love it!

Heading: Love the phone.
Text: Upgraded from a 5S and love it. There are more features and benefits.

Heading: Love
Text: Love the iPhone X! Wasn’t sure I could get used to the no home button, but after a few hours I forgot it even once existed. Love this phone!

Heading: First iPhone
Text: Long time android user. Nexus and Pixel. The iPhone X has a superb build. Screen is great. Very fast. Camera is equal to or better than any other phone. I’m an Apple guy now.

Heading: Water resistant & great camera
Text:
The X is amazing.
I did a 13 day trip down the Colorado River through the Grand Canyon with it in my pocket!

Heading: Love my phone!
Text: The camera is amazing and the fact that you can take selfies in portrait mode is awesome!! Love love love!!

Heading: Great evolution of the iPhone
Text:
The iPhone X has a jaw-dropping OLED screen and top-tier camera. 
The wireless charging works great and the speed of the phone is wonderful.

Heading: Easy and friendly to use.
Text:
Ive had every iphone that has came out after the 3G , and i mist say “ that i really do love this phone “ !
Especially the face recognition! I no longer have to use my fat large thumb multiple times to get into my phone . Just a simple tap to turn on ,or the phone itself knwoing you picked it up and looking at it . So that it unlocks! I love it !

Heading: LOVE IT!!!
Text: Beautiful....no words to describe....so happy!!! 2happy with my decision to get this phone! And it is soooooooo much better than my old phone! Get it

Heading: iPhone X
Text: iPhone X is a wonderful device. It was a bit cumbersome for me to figure out how to do all the other things I used to on my previous iPhones but the Best Buy Mobile staff is the best. They took time to explain all the features I had questions about....and well, candidly, YouTube taught me more stuff. :) Buy iPhone X

Heading: Love the camera!
Text: Awesome camera. Love the easiness of the Face ID! Love apple and all its user friendly options!!!

Heading: Great product
Text: Like the wide display and screen quality. Battery life much better than the previous Iphone 6s that I had

Heading: Great. Best iPhone yet.
Text: Bought this for my wife. We’ve owned many iPhones and this one has the best screen by far. The lack of home button is not missed. We’ve done comparisons by playing the same movie at the same time on the iPhone X and a iPhone 7plus and the X’s screen is so much better. The cameras are the best too.

Heading: Apple
Text: Love it absolutely love it Apple at its best would definitely recommend it to anyone that is in the Apple do love it better than Android

Heading: Nice phone
Text: Iphone X is a nice phone but takes some getting used to with no home button and having to use facial recognition or pass code. Swiping, closing and more are all different so don't expect to pick it up and use it like any other iPhone. Overall im very happy with the size and speed and would buy it again.

Heading: Slick and nice large screen
Text: The iPhone X is a choice unit. To match the Samsung, they expanded the screen to cover the whole unit and it's pretty sweet. Resolution is unreal; very crisp and clear. However, it also shows smudges a lot more than the previous models, but that's a small price to pay for an overall nice phone!

Heading: Easy to use
Text: I bought this phone to replace my old one and the transaction was very smooth.

Heading: Love it
Text: I was very skeptical at first on buying my iPhone X but after having it for a couple weeks, I absolutely love it. I upgraded from an iPhone 6s So this is a big jump for me but highly recommend it for everybody else. If you have an iPhone 7 or 8 do not upgrade. It would seem worthless for you.

Heading: Love It
Text: Bought this upgrade for my wife. It has a slight learning curve due to the different/updated features from her previous iPhone, but she loves it!

Heading: Very Good
Text: I love my new phone! Upgraded from an iPhone7 so no more home button but now I have to swipe up. It’s all about that swiping game now. Should’ve waited to get the iPhoneXS Max though..

Heading: Meh?
Text:
I love this phone but, it took a long time for get there? 
Way to expensive for what you get.

Heading: Omg!!!!!
Text: I live my iPhone! This is the best one they’ve made yet. Not having the button takes some getting used to but it’s sooo worth it.

Heading: Great device, bit expensive
Text: I bought it for my son going to college. I could have waited a few days to buy the latest version however my son didn’t care for the “improvements” in the newer version. Besides this was cheaper by $100. He loves it.

Heading: It’s an iPhone !!! Need I say more
Text: It’s not perfect but then again, it comes pretty close to it. Closer then anyone else. Love it. Not really happy about the battery percentage not being displayed but I’ve learned to live with it. Small learning curve with the new gestures but very easy to get used to and within the first few hours you’ll feel at home with it. Recommend.

Heading: Best phone ever
Text: The IPhone X is my first iPhone having been a longtime Android user. This phone pushed me to switch and I could not be happier. This is by far my favorite phone ever and could not be happier with the ease of use, features and functionalities.

Heading: Love my Phone!!
Text: This iPhone is wonderful! I love the Face ID and the larger screen. I previously had an iPhone 6 Plus, so the change in the device size is a welcome one. The camera is AH-Mazing! The OLED screen is also a nice feature. Videos show very well. It’s easy to adjust to not having a home button. I don’t miss it at all! I would definitely recommend the purchase!

Heading: IphoneX
Text: I have wanted this phone for a long time. Best Buy has a great deal on it so I bought it. I have had 2 iPhones before this one. It is a great phone; love the camera on it!!

Heading: Surprised
Text: Didn’t think I’d like the Face ID but it works well. The size of the phone is better than the previous model and the sound and video is a huge improvement.

Heading: Love it
Text: Didn’t think I’d like the Face ID but it works well. The size of the phone is better than the previous model and the sound and video is a huge improvement.

Heading: Great phone
Text: Great phone to replace my iPhone 6. Love the Face ID, but sometimes miss the finger ID. Much faster than my old phone, and once you get used to how to navigate without the home button, it’s a breeze!

Heading: Love my new phone!
Text: Upgrades are always nice! Definitely nice going from a 7 to a X!

Text: I've really enjoyed this phone since day one. It took about a day for the learning curve without a home button, but now it is second nature. I replaced a Galaxy S8+ that was buggy and crashed all the time. This phone takes great pics, has excellent battery life, and has worked flawlessly without crashing once. Great investment!

Heading: So fast and easy to use

Heading: Best. iPhone I ever owned

Heading: Face recognition doesn’t always work
Text: Face recognition doesn’t always work. It’d be much more helpful if the thumbprint option would pop up. Having to type in a password is still a bit of a nuisance, but I appreciate the fact that it still works with sunglasses on. Also, face recognition works in the dark, sometimes. The way to fully close apps takes additional steps versus swiping up on other iPhones. It’s not exactly a smooth transition from the other iphones. Does take a lot of getting used to. Camera quality is great, but I would recommend sticking to the iPhone 8 for the price.

Heading: Happy Iphone X owner

When it was ready to be picked up we found that they had just sent her a new phone, that should have been the first warning. Now after owning the phone for a little over 4 months the battery is failing. It shows 100%, but unexpectedly shuts off. When you try to turn it on it says that the battery is low. After plugging it in and the phone turns on it shows that the battery is at 100%...Taking it in (again) to be fixed. For the cost of this device you think it would last longer.

Heading: Not Too Sure Yet
Text:
Im honestly not very impressed with this phone. I was under the impression Apple was designing this phone with the ability to essentially be used as a computer, with connectivity to a keyboard and display. This is not a feature I would use often or is of great importance, but it is innovation and could help support the price of this.

Additionally, why make this in all glass? (Aside from the fact that it will boost accessory sales as well as repair revenue).

This phone still acts glitchy and I got the unlocked version with 256GB memorory. The unlocked version has 4GB of RAM vs the traditional iPhone X models (Carrier Specifict Models). You can research this to confirm if you doubt this is correct.

I am at the point where I might just return the phone and either choose another alternative such as the Google2 phone or the BlackBerry KeyOne.

My life is cluttered enough, sometimes getting back to basics is most important. Especially when the difference in price is $700.00!

Heading: Gimmicky.
Text: So Apple finally decided to redesign the iPhone and this is the result. I give them props for the overall look at the phone as well as finally upgrading the screen technology and adding wireless charging. However the gestures are not intuitive and face ID does not work nearly as well as they say it does unless you disable The required attention feature which makes the phone less secure. With this feature turned on it only works one in every five or six trials for me. It was a massive mistake for them to illuminate touch ID. If they were going to go all screen on the front that’s fine. But they should have put a fingerprint reader on the back of the phone like the rest of the industry. Hopefully they will rectify this in the second generation next year.

Heading: Beautiful phone
Text: I upgraded from a 7+ to the X. I loved my + but it finally died on me and was always just a little bit too wide for my hands and difficult to fit into pockets. The screen on the X is absolutely stunning, I am constantly in awe of how crisp and clear, how vibrant the colors look. The camera on the + was great but all the hype about the camera on the X is completely true to form. It’s incredible. I take a lot of pictures and videos of my horses and the quality is so much better on the X. I love that the phone isn’t quite as wide but has a larger screen size at the same time. It’s easier to handle and use, and much more comfortable. The phone is lightning fast and super responsive. The sound quality is excellent, no problems so far. I love the quick SOS feature built right in to the phone. All in all, this is a great device that has so far been a complete joy to use.

Heading: Glitchy!!!
Text: 5th iPhone I've owned and this is the first one I HATE! Repeatedly opens in landscape mode, have to close it and reopen multiple times a day! Gets hung up and freezes when trying to text more than one image, then again freezes for no reason at all! Open camera to take pic and there's just a blurry screen- again must close out and reopen, often several times! (Forget getting that spontaneous shot!) I got rid of my 6S thinking some of the occasional hiccups were due to its age-I should've kept it! Kept hoping updates would correct issues, they haven't and I see no online fixes. Did online chat w/Apple to make appt at local Apple Store and was told they currently have no iPhone appts available!!! (Looking 3 weeks out- Unbelievable.) And forget walking in to local store as they won't even talk to you without one!

Heading: Perfection
Text: I had been a longtime Samsung device user and had previously been using a much larger Samsung device. I realized that I needed a smaller phone that was manageable when using with only one hand. It is the perfect size. The camera on this device is great. Battery life is on par with my previous Samsung. Performance wise, it is extremely fluid and rarely slows down. I would recommend getting the necessary cable and adapter for fast charging. It charges incredibly fast. Overall, I would definitely recommend this device for anyone especially those who want top performance without the big size.

Heading: Best iPhone yet
Text: I’ve had almost every iPhone in the past and before this had the iPhone 7 Plus 128gb black. This phone is amazing. The screen is stunning and new features are a nice change. For the first few hours it can be quite a change navigating the new gestures of your a previous iPhone user but you quickly start t adopt to the new gestures quite easily. The sound is much better, wireless charging is a quite usable feature and yes animojis are quite fun. Face ID is great but the extra swipe in the beginning is a little taxing. Hopefully more apps will integrate Face ID from Touch ID as I have had to enter passwords where I previously used Touch ID as that is not an option as of yet. So in conclusion the iPhone X feels like an actual upgrade compared to the past of a few new features not a new phone. It’s defiantly worth the purchase as it is quite enjoyable.

Heading: iPhone X Defect
Text: My iPhone X expierence so far. Preordered on Oct. 27th and managed to get a Gray/Black 256GB Iphone X. Finally arrives on the 6th and I don’t get a chance to open it up and attempt to hook up my new phone until the 11th. So here I go beaming with excitement to check out my new device that just cost me the equivalent of a house payment. Open it up and everything looks good at first and then I use my iPhone 6S light to look at the screen for any dust as I’ve already gotten a screen protector in hand to put on my new device before I even get started. Then I see it. A very very small scratch or crack under the screen coming from the notch area at the top of the phone coming down maybe 1/2 a cm long. So I schedule an appointment to talk to an Apple rep. for 8:45am and he finally calls me at 8:48am. I explain to him what I observed on my phone and he doesn’t seem to thrilled to help me out today. Maybe because it’s a Saturday and he’s at work. During our conversation he makes a statement that I didn’t really care for. Such as... Maybe the delivery man dropped your package and maybe that’s what happened. Obviously this is a manufacturing defect since it’s under the screen. So I get two options. Option A) Send my phone in to be repaired and who knows how long that will take and why would I want a brand new item I just paid a lot of money for to be repaired due to a defect. Option B) Go to the Apple Store and have them look at it and I can try and request a new phone. Oh and the next available time I can get an appointment is 4 days away and I’ll have to take off work early to resolve an Apple manufacturing defect. So I guess we will see how my Apple Store experience goes. I’ve had an Apple phone going back to the 3GS days and I’ve dealt with Apple Customer Service in the past with no issues but so far I’d have to say I’m extremely disappointed in the quality control of the IPhone X and the customer service expierence with Apple. Hopefully all is redeemed on the 14th. To be continued...
